mapper.select: SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID qestnrTmplatId, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY qestnrTmplatTy FROM LETTNQUSTNRTMPLAT
mapper.update: UPDATE LETTNQUSTNRIEM SET IEM_SN=#{iemSn}, IEM_CN=#{iemCn}, ETC_ANSWER_AT=#{etcAnswerAt}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE QUSTNR_IEM_ID = #{qustnrIemId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID qestnrQesitmId, (SELECT QESTN_CN FROM LETTNQUSTNRQESITM WHERE QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID) QESTNR_QESITM_CN, A.QESTNR_ID, (SELECT QUSTNR_SJ FROM LETTNQESTNRINFO WHERE QESTNR_ID = A.QESTNR_ID) QESTNR_CN, A.IEM_SN, A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID, A.IEM_CN, A.ETC_ANSWER_AT, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID qestnrTmplatId, DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') as LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM LETTNQUSTNRIEM A WHERE 1=1 AND A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID = #{qustnrIemId}

SELECT A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID qestnrQesitmId, A.QESTNR_ID, A.IEM_SN, A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID, A.IEM_CN, A.ETC_ANSWER_AT, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID qestnrTmplatId, DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMVNUSERMASTER WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM, DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') as LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM LETTNQUSTNRIEM A WHERE 1=1
AND IEM_CN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}), '%')
AND FRST_REGISTER_ID IN (SELECT ESNTL_ID FROM COMVNUSERMASTER WHERE USER_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}), '%') )
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM LETTNQUSTNRIEM WHERE 1=1
AND IEM_CN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}), '%')
AND FRST_REGISTER_ID IN (SELECT ESNTL_ID FROM COMVNUSERMASTER WHERE USER_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}), '%') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTNQUSTNRIEM ( QUSTNR_QESITM_ID, QESTNR_ID, IEM_SN, QUSTNR_IEM_ID, IEM_CN, ETC_ANSWER_AT, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{qestnrQesitmId}, #{qestnrId}, #{iemSn}, #{qustnrIemId}, #{iemCn}, #{etcAnswerAt}, #{qestnrTmplatId}, sysdate(), #{frstRegisterId}, sysdate(), #{lastUpdusrId} )
